data.introduce: 国际汇率计算服务是为用户提供了货币转换功能，将一种货币转换成另一种货币形式。
data.business: 国际汇率计算接口是用于查询货币转换。
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TSK_AirfarePrice","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Request","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"SITA_AirfareCalculateCurrencyRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Currency calculator request, performs an exchange
				rate calculation using the exchange rate mechanism selected,
				returning the converted amount and rounding details.","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point of Sale (POS) is
				the details identifying the party or connection channel making the
				request.","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"0..5","default":"","description":"Provides information on
				the source of a request.","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求号信息：An identifier of the making the request (e.g. ATA/IATA/ID number, Electronic Service Provider (ERSP), Association of British Travel(ABTA)).","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"请求类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"填写iata号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Used to identify the of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).","children":[]}]},{"name":"Position","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Used to identify
				geospatial postion of the requesting entity.","children":[{"name":"PositionGroup","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Used to specify the
				geographic coordinates of a location.","children":[{"name":"@Latitude","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"The measure of the distance on a meridian north or south of the equator.","children":[]},{"name":"@Longitude","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"The measure of the distance on a meridian east or west of the prime meridian.","children":[]},{"name":"@Altitude","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"The height of an item, above sea level.","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Character
				Strings, length 1 to 16","children":[]},{"name":"@AirlineVendorID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"@AirportCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"销售城市代码：按office所在地，填写城市三字码，例如PEK","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"CurrencyRQInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@FromCurrency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"From currency code：Currency to convert from","children":[]},{"name":"@ToCurrency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"To currency code：Currency to convert to","children":[]},{"name":"@Rate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Conversion rate：Indicates a rate to use in the currency calculation","children":[]},{"name":"@RateDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Date：Indicates the date that the rate applies","children":[]},{"name":"@ExchangeRateType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Conversion rate Indicator：Indicates the type of exchange rate either BSR,BBR,IATA,ICH","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Amount：The amount to convert.Omit the amount return rates for the currency","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema:
[{"name":"TSK_AirfarePrice","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Response","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"响应信息","children":[{"name":"SITA_AirfareCalculateCurrencyRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Currency calculator request, performs an exchange
				rate calculation using the exchange rate mechanism selected,
				returning the converted amount and rounding details.","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Standard way to indicate successful processing of an OTA message Return an empty element of this type indicates type","children":[]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Standard way to
								indicate successful processing of an OTA message, but one in
								which warnings are generated.","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"Standard way to indicate
				successful processing of an OTA message, but one in which warnings
				are generated","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for codes in the OTA
				code tables. Possible values of this pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or
				101.EQP.X.","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"CurrencyRQInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@FromCurrency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Alphabetic
				Strings, length exactly 3","children":[]},{"name":"@ToCurrency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Alphabetic
				Strings, length exactly 3","children":[]},{"name":"@Rate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Indicates a rate to use in the currency
										calculation","children":[]},{"name":"@RateDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicates the date that the rate applies.","children":[]},{"name":"@ExchangeRateType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Exchange rates may be one
				of Bankers Selling Rate (BSR), Bankers Buying Rate (BBR), IATA Rate
				Of Exchange (ROE) or IATA Clearing House (ICH)","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3
				decimals","children":[]},{"name":"@RoundingMethod","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"进位规则为up/down/nearest等，此规则来源于IATA，可参考FSC的展示结果","children":[]},{"name":"@RoundingUnit","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"表示保留的小数点位数，保留到整数位或者十位等，此规则来源于IATA，可参考FSC的展示结果","children":[]}]},{"name":"CurrencyCalculation","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Currency conversion occurs only when an Amount
									is specified...","children":[{"name":"ExchangeRateDetail","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"InternationalTaxRounding","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@RoundingMethod","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Rounding Method for fares","children":[]},{"name":"@RoundingUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3
				decimals","children":[]}]},{"name":"InternationalRounding","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@RoundingMethod","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Rounding Method for fares","children":[]},{"name":"@RoundingUnit","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3
				decimals","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@FareAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3
				decimals","children":[]},{"name":"@FareAmountTruncated","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3
				decimals","children":[]},{"name":"@TaxAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for amounts, max 3
				decimals","children":[]},{"name":"@Currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for Alphabetic
				Strings, length exactly 3","children":[]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"A collection of errors
				that occurred during the processing of a message.","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"If present, this refers a table of coded values exchanged between applications to errors or warnings. Refer to OTA Code List Error Codes (ERR).","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"The Error element MUST the Type attribute that uses a recommended set of values indicate the error type. The validating XSD can expect to values that it has NOT been explicitly coded for and them by using Type ="Unknown". Refer to OTA Code List Type (EWT).","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]},{"name":"@Content","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" Inner service Error ","msgZh":" 内部异常 "},{"code":" -34002 ","name":null,"msg":" city or airport code is empty ","msgZh":" 城市或者机场代码为空 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" Input Error ","msgZh":" 输入参数有误 "},{"code":" -500 ","name":null,"msg":" office code is empty ","msgZh":" office代码为空 "},{"code":" -501 ","name":null,"msg":" iata code is empty ","msgZh":" iata代码为空 "},{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<TSK_AirfarePrice>
	<Request>
	
		<SITA_AirfareCalculateCurrencyRQ xmlns="http://www.sita.aero/PTS/fare/2005/12/RateOfExchangeRQ" xmlns:ota="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchemainstance" Version="0.001" TicketDate="2012-01-26">
			<ota:POS>

<ota:Source>
  <ota:RequestorID Type="7" ID="8Le0x-ee4wR-II49g-MsCDk" ID_Context="Airfare" /> 
  </ota:Source>
			
					<!-- 销售城市代码 -->
					<ota:Source AirlineVendorID="CZ" AirportCode="PEK"/>
					<!-- office号 -->
					<ota:Source PseudoCityCode="PEK099"/>
					<!-- IATA信息 -->
					<ota:Source>
						<ota:RequestorID Type="13" ID="08307880" ID_Context="IATA_Number"/>
					</ota:Source>
			</ota:POS>
			<!--运价信息 -->
			<CurrencyRQInfo FromCurrency="EUR" ToCurrency="USD" RateDate="2014-06-13" Amount="0100.00" ExchangeRateType="BankersSellingRate"/>
		</SITA_AirfareCalculateCurrencyRQ>
	</Request>
</TSK_AirfarePrice>
qaApiDemos.response:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<TSK_AirfarePrice xmlns="http://www.travelsky.com/fare/xmlInterface">
	<Response>
		<sita:SITA_AirfareCalculateCurrencyRS xmlns:sita="http://www.sita.aero/PTS/fare/2005/12/CalculateCurrencyRS" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ota="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05" Version="0.001" TimeStamp="2013-08-07T06:33:03" Target="Test">
			<sita:Success/>
			<sita:CurrencyRQInfo FromCurrency="EUR" ToCurrency="USD" RateDate="2014-06-13" Amount="100.00" ExchangeRateType="BankersSellingRate"/>
			<sita:CurrencyCalculation FareAmount="133.00" FareAmountTruncated="132.580" TaxAmount="132.60" Currency="USD">
				<sita:ExchangeRateDetail FromCurrency="EUR" ToCurrency="USD" RateOfExchange="1.3258" ExchangeRateType="BankersSellingRate">
					<sita:InternationalRounding RoundingMethod="RoundToNearest" RoundingUnit="1.00"/>
					<sita:InternationalTaxRounding RoundingMethod="RoundToNearest" RoundingUnit="0.10"/>
				</sita:ExchangeRateDetail>
			</sita:CurrencyCalculation>
		</sita:SITA_AirfareCalculateCurrencyRS>
		<Token>960b5eb276536a489372fd087a25e950</Token>
		<Version>3.4</Version>
	</Response>
</TSK_AirfarePrice>
